# EDA 
## Summaries
```{r bio summary}
bio_w %>%
  summary
```
```{r bio NAs}
bio_w %>%
  summarise_all(~ sum(is.na(.))) %>%
  pivot_longer(everything()) %>%
  mutate(propNA=round((value/142)*100,0)) %>%
  filter(propNA > 50)
```
Need to remove above variables from CIT.

```{r observations per state}
bio_w %>%
  group_by(loc_state) %>%
  tally

```

```{r studies per state}
bio_w %>%
  group_by(loc_state, study) %>%
  tally() %>%
  group_by(loc_state) %>%
  tally()

```

## Biomass distribution
```{r LRRbio density plot}
bio_w %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=LRRbio))+
  geom_density()+
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0,
             color = "red")
```

```{r prop CC decreased bio}
bio_w %>%
  mutate(quad=ifelse(LRRbio <= 0, "win", "loss")) %>%
  group_by(quad) %>%
  tally() %>%
  mutate(prop=round((n/142)*100,0))

```

```{r LRRyield density}
bio_w %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=LRRyield))+
  geom_density()+
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0,
             color = "red")
```
```{r prop CC increased yield}
bio_w %>%
  drop_na(LRRyield) %>%
  mutate(quad=ifelse(LRRyield > 0, "win", "loss")) %>%
  group_by(quad) %>%
  tally() %>%
  mutate(prop=round((n/83)*100,0))

```
## Biomass CIT  
```{r bio partykit}
bio_w %>%
  dplyr::select(pub_year, 
    decade,
    study_duration,
    loc_state,
    lat, long, 
    soil_type,
    cc_spec,
    cc_type,
    tillage_sys,
    cc_plant.kgha,
    cc_pMETH,
    cc_term.METH,
    cc_term.METH2,
    add_herb,
    cc_bio_Mgha,
    crop,
    `weed type`,
    weed.sing.com,
    weed.spp,
    LRRbio,
    #LRRyield
  ) %>%
  ctree(LRRbio ~ .,
        data = .) %>%
  plot
```

## Biomass x yield quadrants CIT
```{r bio vs yield}
bio_w %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=LRRbio, y=LRRyield))+
  geom_point(color="purple")+
  geom_smooth()+
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0)+
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0)+
  geom_rug()

```

```{r bio_q}
bio_q <- bio_w %>%
  mutate(quad=case_when(
    LRRbio <= 0 & LRRyield > 0 ~ "w-w",
    LRRbio <= 0 & LRRyield <= 0 ~ "w-l",
    LRRbio > 0 & LRRyield > 0 ~ "l-w",
    LRRbio > 0 & LRRyield <= 0 ~ "l-l"
  )) %>%
  mutate(quad=factor(quad))

bio_q
```

```{r quadrant counts}
bio_q %>%
  drop_na(LRRbio, LRRyield) %>%
  group_by(quad) %>%
  tally

```

```{r bio quad party}
bio_q %>%
  dplyr::select(
    #pub_year, 
    decade,

    lat, long,

    weed.sing.com,

    quad
    #LRRbio,

  ) %>%
  drop_na(quad) %>%

```

## Spatial
```{r missing long but not lat}
bio_q %>%
  distinct(pub_reference, long, lat) %>%
  filter(is.na(long) & !(is.na(lat)))
```

Look into these above. How does it have lat but not long?  

```{r bio_sp}
bio_sp <- bio_q %>%
  drop_na(long, lat, quad) %>%
  st_as_sf(coords = c("long", "lat")) %>%
  st_set_crs(value = 4326)
  

bio_sp
```


```{r states}
states <- us_states() %>%
  dplyr::select(state_name, state_abbr) %>%
  filter(!(state_name %in% c("Hawaii", 
                             "Alaska",
                             "Puerto Rico"))) %>%
  st_transform(crs = 4326)

states
```

```{r map}
ggplot()+
  geom_sf(data=states)+
  geom_sf(data=bio_sp)
```

```{r states filtered}
states_se <- states %>%
  filter(state_abbr %in% unique(bio_sp$loc_state))

ggplot()+
  geom_sf(data=states_se)+
  geom_sf(data=bio_sp #%>% st_jitter(.3)
          ,
          aes(color=quad),
          size=.7,
          show.legend = F)+
  facet_wrap(~quad)

```

## CC biomass
```{r bio vs cc biomass}
bio_w %>%
      mutate(grass=ifelse(cc_type=="grass",
                      "grass",
                      "other")) %>%

  ggplot(aes(x=cc_bio_Mgha, 
             y=LRRbio,
             color=grass))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method="lm")

```

```{r yield vs cc biomass}
bio_w %>%
  mutate(grass=ifelse(cc_type=="grass",
                      "grass",
                      "other")) %>%
  filter(LRRyield < 2) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=cc_bio_Mgha, y=LRRyield, color=grass))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method="lm")

```
